content:
I am a university fresh graduate, and I am looking for some opportunities in New York. Could you provide insights into some professional jobs in London?
Begin!
Question: Could you please clarify if you are looking for job opportunities in New York or if you meant to ask for jobs in London?
I am looking for a teaching job
I will search for teaching job opportunities in New York for recent university graduates. Let's start by executing the search for teaching positions in that location.

name: search_for_jsearch
content: {"error": "", "response": "{'status': 'OK', 'request_id': 'd571b1d7-80ce-4c76-af66-d54ab864937c', 'parameters': {'query': 'teaching jobs in new york', 'page': 1, 'num_pages': 1, 'employment_types': ['FULLTIME'], 'job_requirements': ['no_experience'], 'country': 'us', 'language': 'en'}, 'data': [{'job_id': 'UcTu2JY1-tP9FBT8AAAAAA==', 'employer_name': 'Success Academy', 'employer_logo': 'https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTUEu0p4hKs4L7iCSswi99x-t98whLXxMDbck3h&s=0', 'employer_website': 'https://www.successacademies.org', 'employer_company_type': None, 'employer_linkedin': None, 'job_publisher': 'Success Academy', 'job_employment_type': 'FULLTIME', 'job_employment_types': ['FULLTIME'], 'job_employment_type_text': 'Full-time', 'job_title': 'Entry Level Teachers - Referrals Only', 'job_apply_link': 'https://jobs.successacademies.org/us/en/job/R0015444/Entry-Level-Teachers-Referrals-Only?utm_campaign=google_jobs_apply&utm_source=google_jobs_apply&utm_medium=organic', 'job_apply_is_direct': False,...

name: search_filters_for_jsearch
content: {"error": "Function executing from toolenv.tools.Data.jsearch.api import search_filters error...\nsearch_filters() missing 1 required positional argument: 'query'", "response": ""}

I found an opportunity for teaching in New York. Here are the details:

- **Job Title:** Entry Level Teachers - Referrals Only
- **Employer:** Success Academy
- **Employment Type:** Full-time
- **Application Link:** [Apply here](https://jobs.successacademies.org/us/en/job/R0015444/Entry-Level-Teachers-Referrals-Only?utm_campaign=google_jobs_apply&utm_source=google_jobs_apply&utm_medium=organic)
- **Employer Website:** [Success Academy](https://www.successacademies.org)

I will now finalize this process.
